effect.black-white: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.
effect.black-2-white-2: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.

short_effect.black-white: Has a 30% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.
short_effect.black-2-white-2: Has a 30% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.

flavor_text.black-white: The user attacks by shooting muddy water at the opposing team. It may also lower the targets’ accuracy.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user attacks by shooting muddy water at the opposing team. It may also lower the targets’ accuracy.
